00099 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00100  * Overloadable conversion shim functions:
00101  *
00102  * bool
00103  */
00104 
00108 #if 0
00109     inline std::basic_string<ff_char_t> filter_type(bool value, bool const*, ff_char_t const volatile*)
00110     {
00111         return value ? FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("True") : FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("False");
00112     }
00113 #else /* ? 0 */
00114     inline ff_string_slice_t filter_type(bool value, bool const*, ff_char_t const volatile*)
00115     {
00116         ff_string_slice_t   result;
00117 
00118         // The following implementation is valid only because the string
00119         // literals go into the program data section, and are available
00120         // throughout the lifetime of the process.
00121         if(value)
00122         {
00123             result.len  =   4;
00124             result.ptr  =   FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("True");
00125         }
00126         else
00127         {
00128             result.len  =   5;
00129             result.ptr  =   FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("False");
00130         }
00131 
00132         return result;
00133     }
00134 #endif /* 0 */
00135

00143 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
